response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. This exceptional piece is valued at $1,200,000 by you, and I am eager to share its potential impact with you. Considering its unparalleled quality and value, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,350,000. I am confident this offer presents a unique opportunity for you to maximize your investment while securing a competitive advantage in your field. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or explore any other aspects of the product that might be of interest to you.", "product_price": 1350000}
